column4: Latest;Banteay Meanchey: Mobile Customs Officials along with Veterinary Officials of the Provincial Department of Agriculture cooperated to crack down on stolen 4.5 ton pork products imported from Thailand.------The crackdown on illegal shipment of pork products took place on the night of May 5
